ai-patthana15.10:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.10:0.3_0: And there are material delights for the sake of material possessions.
ai-patthana15.10:1.1_0: Or causes and conditions that give rise to material possessions.
ai-patthana15.10:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.10:2.1_0: Because of honor, respect, esteem, and venerate the teaching for the sake of sensual pleasures.
ai-patthana15.10:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.10:3.1_0: for the sake of worldly pleasures, not for the sake of material possessions, nor for the sake of honor, for the sake of worldly gain, not for the sake of material delights.
ai-patthana15.10:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
